The Real Umbrella Lady

The real umbrella lady is my incredible mother.

When a random opportunity arose in 2005 for my mom and dad to meet me in London and then travel to Paris, my mom jumped at the chance. She bought Rick Steve's travel guides and planned the hotels, transportation, site seeing, and historical stops.

That trip ended up being the first of many - all of which my mom tirelessly planned down to the hour. My dad started to affectionately refer to her as our "Umbrella Lady" - that tour guide that carries the bright red umbrella so that everyone can easily see and follow them. At her preparation, the took trips to Spain, Ireland, Scotland, China, and Greece - some I got to tag along on also!

We have a passion for traveling the world - we're thrilled to share that passion with you!
